plot: At the end of her tether and determined to protect her family from her violent step-father, Flea makes a plan that could get rid of him for good. Will she overcome the odds?
title: Flea
plot_es: At the end of her tether and determined to protect her family from her violent step-father, Flea makes a plan that could get rid of him for good. Will she overcome the odds?
plot_en: At the end of her tether and determined to protect her family from her violent step-father, Flea makes a plan that could get rid of him for good. Will she overcome the odds?
